nodes.bodyText: I don't see why is it necessary to load key every time here instead of doing it once as it is done.

We need to add the signature private key to the config properties which become the Saml2Settings. This is so that it can be accessed by the onelogin SamlResponse here: https://github.com/onelogin/java-saml/blob/master/core/src/main/java/com/onelogin/saml2/authn/SamlResponse.java#L1074
Why can't it be passed to the Saml2SettingsProvider.java constructor?
Makes sense. And that makes this a much smaller PR.
Please add this as decryptAssertionsTest() (keep basicTest() as is).
nit: this.encryptAssertion = encryptAssertion; on a separate line.
Curious where we are using spSignaturePrivateKey in the Saml2SettingsProvider.
It's read from the settings here: https://github.com/onelogin/java-saml/blob/master/core/src/main/java/com/onelogin/saml2/authn/SamlResponse.java#L1074
